name: Manage_Okta_Group_Membership_Based_on_Job_Code_or_Profile_Attribute_Mapping
title: Workflows Template: Manage Okta Group Membership Based on Job Code or Profile Attribute Mapping
description: In many organizations a set of Okta group memberships are determined based on Job Codes or more generally, by user profile attributes to implement Role-based access control (RBAC). This template illustrates group assignment based on user profile attributes.
